brief.content-text: The diagram depicts what P P P is and relates it to HDLC. HDLC is the default serial encapsulation method when you connect two Cisco routers. P P P is used to connect to a non-Cisco router. A block diagram shows the components of P P P. Within the block labeled P P P are smaller blocks, one labeled HDLC, one labeled LCP (Link Control Protocol), and multiple blocks of the same type labeled NCP's (Network Control Protocols).
